keyword: how many calories in a corona beer
title: How Many Calories in a Corona Beer?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a corona beer, including carbs, sodium, and other nutrients for a standard 12 oz bottle, plus variations and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in a Corona Beer?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle of Corona Extra lager, 4.6% ABV, no added mixers or lime.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand variant, serving size, and any additions like lime or salt; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard 12 oz Corona beer contains about 148 calories and 14 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add a lime wedge and salt rim
Serve as 16 oz pint (vs. 12 oz bottle)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Corona beer bottle?
faqs.a: About 148 calories in a standard 12 oz Corona Extra bottle.
Yes, approximately 13.9 g of carbs per 12 oz bottle, mostly from malt.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Corona beer?
What's the difference in calories between Corona Extra and Light?
faqs.a: Corona Light has 99 calories per 12 oz, 49 fewer than Extra.

faqs.q: Are there any fats or proteins in Corona beer?
faqs.a: 0 g fat and about 1.2 g protein per 12 oz bottle.
